title: INDYCAR
description:
The INDYCAR Mobile App powered by NTT DATA, the official mobile app of the NTT INDYCAR SERIES.
The INDYCAR Mobile App allows fans to keep up with the latest news, photos and videos of their favorite drivers or teams.
Live features for INDYCAR Mobile App are available to ALL users, regardless of carrier or country, highlighted by:
- Real-time leaderboard with full-field track map and car telemetry
- Live in-car camera video streaming for select drivers
- Live driver and pit crew radio transmission streams
- Pennzoil INDYCAR Radio Network audio streaming during all track activity
- NTT INDYCAR SERIES Championship “Points-As-They-Run” leaderboard
Additional Key Features:
- Listen to INDYCAR Teleconferences and Press Conferences, as well as Full Race Replays from the Pennzoil INDYCAR Radio Network
- Import the 2020 NTT INDYCAR SERIES race schedules direct to your mobile calendar
- Select your favorite driver and favorite team for quicker access to follow
- Video-On-Demand: On-track highlights, press conferences, and special feature videos
- Latest news and photos
- Standings, race results, upcoming schedules, and race extras such as high-resolution track map, pit assignments, driver performances and spotter guides
- Driver and team profiles
- Get in the game with INDYCAR Fantasy Challenge presented by Firestone, the official fantasy racing game of the NTT INDYCAR SERIES
- Stay up-to-date with INDYCAR on Social Media
- Learn more about the sport with INDYCAR 101
- Current track weather and forecast
- … and more
